build.buildCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

deploy.startCommand: python manage.py migrate --noinput && gunicorn WBPMISUESO.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --threads 4 --timeout 120 --log-level debug --access-logfile - --error-logfile -
